translations.translation: They said: "You are no more than one of those who have been bewitched,
They said, "You are no more than a bewitched and insane man
They said, “You are under a magic spell.”
They said: "You are only one of those bewitched!"
They said: You are only of those deluded;
They said, 'Thou art merely one of those that are bewitched;
They said: Thou art but one of the bewitched;
They said: thou art but of the bewitched;
They said, ‘Indeed you are one of the bewitched.
They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
They said: "You are only one of those bewitched!
They replied: 'You are surely one of those bewitched.
They said, “You are one of those bewitched.
They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
[26:185]   They said, ‘You are indeed one of the bewitched.
421 (They said: thou art but one of the bewitched) you are neither an angel nor a Prophet;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمعوا منه ما سمعوا من الحكم والتذكيرات { قَالُوۤاْ } متهكمين مستهزئين: { إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ } يا شعيب { مِنَ ٱلْمُسَحَّرِينَ } [الشعراء: 185] الذين ضاعت عقولهم بالسحر والافتتان
